Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: (SS, RC): This is the time from SS to RC. It includes SS->OP, OP->RC. So the average would be the sum of the average of (SS,OP) and (OP,RC). Similarly, the standard deviation would be the square root of the sum of squares? Actually, if the two steps are independent, the variance of the sum is the sum of variances. ... Therefore, the average for (SS,RC) = (SS,OP).average + (OP,RC).average = 86400 + 864000 = 950400 seconds (about 11 days). The variance would be (SS,OP).stddev^2 + (OP,RC).stddev^2 = (43200)^2 + (172800)^2.
